Class ReceiptGenerator

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.ReceiptGenerator
public class ReceiptGenerator extends Object
The ReceiptGenerator class creates formatted receipts for BTO flat bookings. It provides methods to generate receipts from both FlatBooking objects and ProjectApplication objects, creating a standardized receipt format that includes applicant details, project information, and booking specifics.

  • Method Details

    • generateReceipt

      public String generateReceipt(FlatBooking booking)
      Generates a receipt for a flat booking.
      Parameters:
      booking - The FlatBooking object containing all booking details
      Returns:
      A formatted receipt as a string, or null if the booking is invalid

    • generateReceipt

      public boolean generateReceipt(ProjectApplication application)
      Generates a receipt from a project application. Creates a temporary FlatBooking object to use the same formatting logic.
      Parameters:
      application - The ProjectApplication to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      true if the receipt was generated successfully, false if the application is invalid

    • formatReceipt

      public String formatReceipt(User user, Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Formats a simple receipt using basic user, project, and flat type information. This method is maintained for backward compatibility with older code.
      Parameters:
      user - The User (applicant) object
      project - The Project object
      flatType - The type of flat being booked
      Returns:
      A formatted receipt as a string
